# Sentimental (Drawback)
## Overview
**Sentimental:** You are sentimental, and your thoughts often stray to the past at inappropriate times. You take a â€”2 penalty on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks to avoid being surprised and on Reflex saving throws to avoid traps or hazards.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 65
